mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reminders (user_id, task_id, reminder_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{taskId}, #{reminderTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, task_id as taskId, reminder_time as reminderTime, is_sent as isSent, created_at as createdAt FROM reminders WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY reminder_time ASC
SELECT id, user_id as userId, task_id as taskId, reminder_time as reminderTime, is_sent as isSent, created_at as createdAt FROM reminders WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id as userId, task_id as taskId, reminder_time as reminderTime, is_sent as isSent, created_at as createdAt FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time <= #{currentTime} AND is_sent = FALSE
mapper.update: UPDATE reminders SET is_sent = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
